# Tidyverse Resources

Below is a shortlist of resources to go deeper specifically into the tidyverse, a framework we will be using frequently in this course.

[Learn the Tidyverse Books and Workshops](https://www.tidyverse.org/learn/)

[R for Data Science](https://r4ds.had.co.nz/)

[Data Visualization: A Practical Introduction](https://socviz.co/)

[Fundamentals of Data Visualization](https://clauswilke.com/dataviz/)

[David Robinson TidyTuesday Videos](https://www.youtube.com/user/safe4democracy/videos)

[Stat 545](https://stat545.com/index.html)

[Useful R Packages for Data Science](https://www.computerworld.com/article/2921176/great-r-packages-for-data-import-wrangling-visualization.html)
